metadata.title: CVE-2018-16080 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A missing check for popup window handling in Fullscreen in Google Chrome onmacOS prior to 69.0.3497.81 allowed a remote attacker to spoof the contentsof the Omnibox (URL bar) via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
oxide-qt: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
